short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change view types on Shopee Malaysia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a convenient toggle button to switch between the default grid layout and an enhanced list view, making it easier to compare products at a glance.

Key features:
• One-click toggle between grid and list views
• Streamlined product information display in list view
• Persistent view preference across sessions
• Compatible with Shopee Malaysia
• Improved readability and product comparison

Optimize your Shopee browsing and make informed purchasing decisions with this user-friendly extension.
